divs: Sighting Details1. Where were you and what were you doing at the time? I was at my house taking my dog out. 2. What made you first notice the object? It was glowing very bright. 3. What did you think the object was when you first noticed it? First thought it was an airplane from barksdale airforce base but then realized it was hovering soundless and bright 4. Describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. It was hovering and emitting bright blue white reddish orange lights. Hasn't moved in 2 hours and is still active as of the time writing this which is 3:15 am ct 5. Describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. I was completely fine. Coherent and aware but was confused at what I am seeing. 6. How did you lose sight of the object? I didn't it's still there.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Shreveport
There were no other sightings in Shreveport on or around October 8th 2013
